segments.text: My family is not big , there are only 3 of us-my parents and I .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My father supports the family , and he is the sole breadwinner . My mother is a housewife .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you live with your family ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we live a happy life together .
segments.speaker: S2
